formationDateDeletionModal.description: If you delete your business `effective date|effective-date` , you won't receive a reminder to submit your annual report when it's due and the reminder won't appear in your calendar.
formationDateDeletionModal.areYouSureModalBody: Are you sure you want to continue?

legalMessageDefaults.legalMessageTextOne: This information is supplied as a guide and is not a substitute for legal or professional advice. It is the responsibility of the business owner to comply with all local, county, and state regulations even if they are not listed here. For no-cost assistance with your business, use the
legalMessageDefaults.legalMessageTextTwo: to speak with a Business Advocate based in New Jersey.

selfRegistration.errorTextGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
selfRegistration.errorTextEmailsNotMatching: Email addresses must match and be valid.
selfRegistration.investNewarkContactSharingCheckboxLabel: I am willing to share my full name and email with Invest Newark for access to the Newark Navigator Service (free Newark business support and resource referrals).
selfRegistration.userTestingCheckboxLabel: I am willing to be contacted to provide feedback on Business.NJ.gov.
selfRegistration.errorTextDuplicateSignUp: This email is already registered. Please log in instead.
selfRegistration.signUpDescriptionText: To get started, please enter your name and email address below.
selfRegistration.errorTextFullNameLength: Full name must be 50 characters or fewer
selfRegistration.newsletterCheckboxLabel: I want to receive the Business.NJ.gov newsletter and receive information likely to affect my business.
selfRegistration.needsAccountModalTitle: Link with myNewJersey to Save Your Progress
selfRegistration.accountSuccessSnackbarBody: You can now save your progress, access more features, and edit your business profile.
selfRegistration.errorTextFullNameSpecialCharacter: Full name may only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and these five characters: , . - ' _
selfRegistration.errorTextFullNameStartWithLetter: Full name must start with a letter
selfRegistration.needsAccountModalBody: To use this feature, you need to complete your registration with the State of New Jersey's secure login system, MyNewJersey. This will ensure your privacy, and allow you to come back any time.

landingPage.section5FirstSupportingText: Knowing exactly what your business needs to get started can be difficult. Each of our personalized guides are unique to your industry and even includes Cannabis retailers. Find what licenses, forms, and permits you need to start your business in New Jersey. Learn the requirements of each application, find out what you get after submitting your application, and store critical business identification numbers all in one place.
landingPage.card1SupportingText: Visit our website with more resources to start, operate, and grow your business.
landingPage.card2SupportingText: Already a registered business and want to know the latest grants and regulations likely to affect your business? Join our weekly newsletter.
landingPage.card3SupportingText: Local experts are available 9 a.m - 5 p.m Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, to help you with any business challenge.
landingPage.section5SecondSupportingText: Don't leave money on the table. Find out if you are eligible for State funding opportunities. Learn about potential grants, tax credits, technical assistance programs, and more. If you are a minority-owned, woman-owned, veteran-owned, or small business, you can find out which certifications apply to you and increase your chances of getting government contracts.
landingPage.section2HeaderText: Starting a Business Has Never Been Faster or Easier!
landingPage.section3HeaderText: Grow Your Business, Get Guidance on State Funding or Certifications!
landingPage.section2SupportingText: See the forms and licenses specific to starting your business and avoiding fines. Be prepared to tell us your business structure, industry, and business location.
landingPage.section3SupportingText: Identify funding programs and certifications across State agencies that fit your business.
landingPage.card3Header: Chat with a New Jersey Representative
landingPage.section5ThirdSupportingText: Get your free, personalized, step-by-step guide. You can track your progress, check the status of applications, speak to NJ-based business advocates, and more!
landingPage.heroSupportingText: Create your free, personalized guide to register and find funding for your New Jersey or out-of-state business.

taxCalendar.accessBody: Get access to your tax calendar.
taxCalendar.snackbarSuccessBody: Your businesses tax deadlines are now in your calendar. NAICS code and location have been verified.
taxCalendar.registrationFollowUpCopyMarkdown:
**Your Tax Calendar is pending.** 

 While some tax eligibilities are available below, your tax calendar is still being calculated by the Department of Treasury. Check back in **7 days** for possible additions to your calendar.
taxCalendar.pendingCopyMarkdown:
**Your Tax Calendar is pending.** 

 Your tax due dates are being added, check back in **7 days**.

filingDefaults.dueDateToolTip: If you did not register your business with your Business.NJ.gov account, your annual report due date was generated by the effective date you submitted.
filingDefaults.lateFilingsMarkdown: All New Jersey taxes that are filed or paid past the due date, [penalties, interest, and collection fees](https://www.nj.gov/treasury/taxation/njit19.shtml) may be assessed. If you are filing or paying late, read up on [abatements of penalties](https://www.state.nj.us/treasury/taxation/abatement-info.shtml).

onboardingDefaults.errorTextMinimumRangeNumericField: Must be between ${min} and ${max} digits long.

formationDateModal.fieldDescription: Find your effective date on your `Certificate of Formation|certificate-formation` .
formationDateModal.dateOfFormationErrorText: Your effective date must be formatted as MM/YYYY.
formationDateModal.areYouSureModalBody: If you change your task status, you need to resubmit your Business's `Effective Date|effective-date` and will lose access to your calendar.
formationDateModal.lockedStatusTooltipText: You have successfully completed forming your business in this task.
formationDateModal.description: To see your annual report due date, please provide your Business's `effective date|effective-date` (the date you formed your business) below.

licenseSearchTask.primaryCTASecondLineText: with the Division of Consumer Affairs
licenseSearchTask.errorTextNotFound: License could not be found. Please try again or contact your licensing agency for more information.
licenseSearchTask.checkStatusText: After applying for your license, enter the details below. You will receive automatic status updates here.
licenseSearchTask.errorTextFieldsRequired: Please fill in all non-optional fields.
licenseSearchTask.foundText: Great, we've found your application! Please check the details below:
licenseSearchTask.tooltipText: Your license status will update automatically after the Division of Consumer Affairs has received your application and you enter your identifying information into the “Check Status” tab below.
licenseSearchTask.errorTextSearchFailed: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

Our starter kit is unique to your industry and even includes Cannabis retailers. Find what licenses, forms, and permits you need to start your business in New Jersey. Learn the requirements of each application, find out what you get after submitting your application, and store critical business identification numbers all in one place.
landingPageExperienceB.section2HeaderText: Starting a Business Has Never Been Faster or Easier!
landingPageExperienceB.section2SupportingText: See the forms and licenses specific to starting your New Jersey or out-of-state business and avoid fines. Be prepared to tell us your business structure, industry, and business location.
landingPageExperienceB.section5ThirdSupportingText: Get your free, personalized, step-by-step guide. You can track your progress, check the status of applications, speak to NJ-based business advocates, and more!
landingPageExperienceB.heroSupportingText: Create your free, personalized guide to register and find funding for your New Jersey or out-of-state business.

searchBusinessNameTask.designatorText: It appears you have included a business designator in your name, such as LLC, LP or CORP. Please remove it at try searching again. Once you have found an available name you then can officially form your business.
searchBusinessNameTask.updateButtonText: Update the name on your Roadmap with this one
searchBusinessNameTask.nameHasBeenUpdatedText: Your business name has been updated.
searchBusinessNameTask.similarUnavailableNamesText: Here are similar business names that are already taken:
searchBusinessNameTask.availableText: It looks like "${name}" might be available, but you should do an official name check using the button below.

footer.madeWithLoveByTheOfficeOfInnovationAriaL: Made with love by the Office of Innovation

registeredForTaxesModal.areYouSureTaxBody: If you change your task status, you will lose access to your Certifications. You can gain access to Certifications again once your status is marked as complete.

unsupportedNavigatorUserPage.title: Chat with a New Jersey Business Representative
unsupportedNavigatorUserPage.subtitle: It seems like you might have some unique needs; please use our chat feature to get guidance from a New Jersey-based business advocate. Should something change, you can come back and use this tool again later.
